snippet.title: 'Casebook,' by Mona Simpson

snippet.description: Since returning to MLS from Europe, Crew defender Michael Parkhurst and Union midfielder Maurice Edu have bolstered their World Cup hopes.

snippet.title: D-Backs' Bolsinger beaten by Dodgers in start
snippet.description: Mike Bolsinger got out of the first inning on five pitches and three ground balls in his first big league start. Then he struck out four of his next five batters and was sailing along until the Los Angeles Dodgers figured him out the second time through the lineup.

snippet.title: Why we root for Chelsea Clinton
snippet.description: Seeing the former first daughter happy feels like payback for her years as a target.

snippet.title: 'The Selected Letters of Elia Kazan' offers an honest look at a complicated artist
snippet.description: The director and author speaks of a mask that hides his truer feelings, but his letters seem quite candid

snippet.title: Bethesda brother and sister sing their way to sibling harmony
snippet.description: Madison and Davis Gestiehr, teens who perform together, rarely fight.
